descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jimmy Butler gets the steal and finds Caleb Martin for the layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler's steal turns into Martin bucket) 2021/11/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler's steal turns into Martin bucket

videos.description: Spencer Dinwiddie puts the Wizards up with a clutch 3-pointer in the final two minutes vs. the Heat.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Spencer Dinwiddie drains the big 3) 2021/11/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Spencer Dinwiddie drains the big 3

videos.description: Jimmy Butler fails to convert a 3-pointer in the final seconds that could have sent the game to overtime.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler can’t capitalize on 3 to send game to OT) 2021/11/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler can't capitalize on 3 to send game to OT
